resources.string: Lingard is an artist based in Atlanta and loves to make music. Lingard Graduated form the Los Angeles Film school and continued his studies in Full Sale to become even more proficient to his craft. Now he is helping young talent to come up and to be heard.

Welcome to The House, where every aspect of your sound finds its true home. In the complex world of music creation, artists often juggle multiple collaborations with producers, engineers, and graphic designers to bring their vision to life. At The Mantra House, we simplify that journey by offering a one-stop destination for all your creative needs. Here, you have seamless access to expert guidance and innovative solutionsâ€”all under one roof. Let us help you transform your ideas into reality, while you focus on what you do best: MAKING MUSIC.
